request.description:
Return the posts based on authentication state and friends. If the user is anonymous he will get the most recent public posts, if he is authenticated he will get most recent public, friends and own posts. `GET https://example.com/api/v1/feed`
Optional: You can add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Returns a authentication token to allow the use of the api.

`POST https://example.com/api/v1/auth/login`

Parameter | Type    | Status
--------- | ------- | -----------
email | string | required
password | string | required

Returns a authentication token to allow the use of the api.

`GET https://example.com/api/v1/{provider}`

Parameter | Type    | Status      | Description
--------- | ------- | ----------- | -----------
provider | string | required | `facebook` or `google`

Get posts and profile data of the specified user. The given posts are based on the authentication state and the friendship relation: * If the user is anonymous, he will only get public posts. * If he is authenticated and is friend of the specified user beside the public posts he will also get the private ones. `PUT https://example.com/api/v1/users/{id}` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- id | int | required | the user identifier
Optional: You can add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Create a new account for the given data

`POST https://example.com/api/v1/users`

Parameter | Type    | Status  | Description
--------- | ------- | ------- | -----------
name | string | required | max length: 100
email | string | required | Has to be email format
password | string | required | |

Create a post from the authenticated user Returns the public user information `POST https://example.com/api/v1/posts` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- body_text | string | optional | post text message body_image | image | optional | post image file public | string | required | post visibility: `yes` or `no` Note: at least one body part need to be submitted
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Edit the data of a post. Return the post with the updated data. `PUT https://example.com/api/v1/posts/{post}` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- post | int | required | the post identifier
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Remove a post. `DELETE https://example.com/api/v1/posts/{post}` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- post | int | required | the post identifier
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Get image resource `GET https://example.com/api/v1/images/{filename}` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- filename | string | required | image filename
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Set friendship between the authenticated user and the given friend identifier. `POST https://example.com/api/v1/friends` Parameter | Type | Status | Description --------- | ------- | ------- | ----------- friend | int | required | the friend identifier
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.

Return the friends of the authenticated user. `GET https://example.com/api/v1/friends`
Required: You must add Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN to your headers.
